home.aboutText: Passionate about capturing authentic moments and creating timeless imagery. With years of experience in portrait, landscape, and event photography, I bring a unique perspective to every project.

about.subtitle: Professional Photographer
about.bio: I am a professional photographer with a passion for capturing the beauty in everyday moments. My journey in photography began over a decade ago, and since then, I've had the privilege of working with diverse clients across multiple genres.
about.portraitsDesc: Professional headshots and personal portraits that capture your unique personality.
about.landscapesDesc: Breathtaking natural scenes and architectural photography for personal and commercial use.
about.eventsDesc: Comprehensive coverage of your special occasions, from weddings to corporate events.
about.commercialDesc: High-quality product and business photography to elevate your brand.

contact.subtitle: Let's create something amazing together
contact.intro: I'd love to hear about your project. Whether you need a photographer for a special event, portraits, or commercial work, feel free to reach out.
contact.formSuccess: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.formError: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

home.aboutText: Strast prema hvatanju autentičnih trenutaka i stvaranju bezvremenih slika. S godinama iskustva u portretnoj, pejzažnoj i event fotografiji, donosim jedinstvenu perspektivu svakom projektu.

about.subtitle: Profesionalni Fotograf
about.bio: Profesionalni sam fotograf sa strašću prema hvatanju ljepote u svakodnevnim trenucima. Moje putovanje u fotografiji započelo je prije više od desetljeća, i od tada sam imao privilegiju raditi s raznim klijentima u više žanrova.
about.portraitsDesc: Profesionalne fotografije koje hvataju vašu jedinstvenu osobnost.
about.landscapesDesc: Zadivljujuće prirodne scene i arhitektonska fotografija za privatnu i komercijalnu upotrebu.
about.eventsDesc: Sveobuhvatno pokrivanje vaših posebnih prigoda, od vjenčanja do korporativnih događaja.
about.commercialDesc: Visokokvalitetna fotografija proizvoda i poslovanja za unapređenje vašeg brenda.

contact.subtitle: Hajdemo stvoriti nešto nevjerojatno zajedno
contact.intro: Volio bih čuti o vašem projektu. Bilo da vam treba fotograf za poseban događaj, portrete ili komercijalni rad, slobodno me kontaktirajte.
contact.formSuccess: Hvala! Vaša poruka je uspješno poslana.
contact.formError: Ups! Nešto je pošlo po zlu. Pokušajte ponovo.
